name: Wellness Recovery
description: Wellness Recovery (legal name: Restorative Wellness Clinic) is a comprehensive addiction treatment and substance use disorder clinic located in London, Kentucky. The clinic provides evidence-based treatment for individuals struggling with addiction, offering medical care, mental health counseling, and substance abuse treatment services. The facility is staffed by licensed healthcare professionals specializing in addiction medicine and behavioral health.
source: Verified from Medmind healthcare database and NPI registry
services: Addiction treatment, substance use disorder counseling, mental health services, medical care, behavioral health services, addiction medicine, outpatient treatment
eligibility: Individuals seeking treatment for substance use disorders and addiction
fees: Accepts most insurance plans, sliding scale available for qualifying patients
notes: NPI: 1992162465. Licensed healthcare facility specializing in addiction treatment and substance use disorders. Offers comprehensive medical and behavioral health services for recovery support.
